title: Casino777 Launches Evolution Live Games
text:
July 09, 2015 11:38 ET Casino777 Launches Evolution Live Games 
LONDON, UNITED KINGDOM--(Marketwired - July 9, 2015) - Online casino operator Casino777 and offline partner Casino de Spa have teamed up with Evolution Gaming, provider of live casino games, and launched a range of live table games. The games are presented 7 days a week between 18:00 and 2:00 by French and Dutch speaking dealers from Spa, the picturesque town famous for its thermal baths. 
Casino de Spa can count itself among the oldest casinos of the world, while its online operation continues to embrace new technologies to extend its offering of games. "Earlier this year we were the first Belgian casino to offer online live roulette from a terrestrial casino in Belgium," says Jean-Christophe Choffray of Casino de Spa. "We are very excited to add Evolution Gaming's table games to our live casino offering, especially those hosted from our very own casino in Spa." 
Jens von Bahr, CEO at Evolution Gaming, commented: "We're enormously proud to have been able to integrate our latest studio within such a famous and historic venue. Belgian players now have access to fully compliant Live Casino games on their desktop, tablet and smartphone, with all of the live tables served by French and Dutch native speaking dealers. It's a world-class service with a distinctive local flavour." 
About Casino de Spa 
Casino de Spa was established in 1763, which makes it one of the oldest casinos in the world. In 2011 Casino de Spa obtained an A+ license to offer online casino games to Belgian players. The website www.casino777.be has since established a strong position within the Belgian online gaming market, offering hundreds of slot machines, table games, dice games, live casino and mobile games. For more information, please visit https://www.casino777.be/ . Contact Information
